publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-128# Allan Wilson: Regional Selective Assistance—That the Parliament calls for the retention and development of the regional selective assistance priority scheme in areas of high and persistent unemployment. Supported by: Rhoda Grant*, Hugh Henry*, George Lyon*, Cathy Jamieson*, Mike Watson*

S1M-128# Allan Wilson: Regional Selective Assistance—That the Parliament calls for the retention and development of the regional selective assistance priority scheme in areas of high and persistent unemployment. Supported by: Rhoda Grant, Hugh Henry, George Lyon, Cathy Jamieson, Mike Watson, Richard Lochhead*
S1M-128# Regional Selective Assistance (lodged on 7 September 1999) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-128# Regional Selective Assistance (lodged on 7 September 1999) Paul Martin*
